description: A dense chocolate cake with a layer of apricot jam and chocolate icing.
A thin dough filled with apples, cinnamon, sugar, and often raisins.
Thin pancakes, similar to French crêpes, filled with various sweet fillings like jam, curd cheese, or chocolate.
Thin pancakes filled with ice cream and often topped with fruit sauce or chocolate syrup.
A fluffy, shredded pancake, served with powdered sugar and apple sauce or plum compote.
A strudel filled with a sweet curd cheese (quark) mixture, often with raisins.
Small dumplings filled with apricots, encased in a dough made from curd cheese, semolina, or potatoes.
A crumbly tart with a layer of red fruit jelly, typically currant, and a lattice of dough on top.
Potato noodles generously sprinkled with ground poppy seeds and sugar.
A sweet soufflé often dusted with powdered sugar and served with a fruit sauce.
Baked yeast dough buns, filled with jam, often served in a vanilla sauce.
